text: I had an amazing experience at punggol primary, most of the teacher are nice and fun, I made alot of friends and tons of memories. Here's a pic of me in the hospital
absolutely unruly school,do not send your kids here if u want quality education as they will turn into road pests like these

hi grad from 2023 id like to say that mdm linda lau hit me with her glasses just because i said ok bro to her like isnt that kinda disrespectful? i get it u couldve scolded me and i wouldnt have said it but u hit me. food is goated mr yeo wh goated. kwl not goated. she kept scolding people who dun wan to talk off their mask. then when she has gate duty she is always on the phone.

SOme relief teachers cannot be considered as teachers. They are just there so students won't misbehave. However, these relief teachers cannot control the class most of the time. I think it is also the classes fault that they hate some relief teachers for no apparent reason and misbehave on purpose. I have some very good friends, but also some friends who act extremely unruly and misbehave a lot. I sometimes see this one guy getting scolded by teacher in the corridor and he was suspended on several occasions. A lot of students rebel against teachers and are extremely rude or even racist. Last time  got some students vaping also. I remember in P3 my english teacher scolded my friend for saying "okay" at her. She was also sometimes very angry for no apparent reason. I remember i got into a fight with a known troublemaker who has since left the school. However,the teachers did manage to control him and he was quite a good student apart from his misbehaviour. I think that many teachers can do their job well.  The canteen food is good, and the vendors are nice. I enjoyed my time here a lot.
The school is amazing had a lot of great oppurtunities and memories. Ignore the hate reviews. They're fake.
